pli-tv-bi-vb-np3:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np3:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena thullanandā bhikkhunī aññatarāya bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ cīvaraṃ parivattetvā paribhuñji.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np3:6.3: Atha kho sā bhikkhunī taṃ cīvaraṃ saṅgharitvā nikkhipi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np3:6.5: “yaṃ te, ayye, mayā saddhiṃ cīvaraṃ parivattitaṃ, kahaṃ taṃ cīvaran”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-np3:6.6: Atha kho sā bhikkhunī taṃ cīvaraṃ nīharitvā thullanandāya bhikkhuniyā dassesi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np3:6.8: “handāyye, tuyhaṃ cīvaraṃ, āhara metaṃ cīvaraṃ, yaṃ tuyhaṃ tuyhamevetaṃ, yaṃ mayhaṃ mayhamevetaṃ, āhara metaṃ, sakaṃ paccāharā”ti acchindi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np3:7.1: Atha kho sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np3:7.2: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā … pe … tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np3:7.3: “kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ cīvaraṃ parivattetvā acchindissatī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np3:7.4: Atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo bhikkhūnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np3:7.6: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ cīvaraṃ parivattetvā acchindatī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-np3:7.9: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ cīvaraṃ parivattetvā acchindissati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np3:7.10: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-np3:7.11: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np3:8.1: “Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ cīvaraṃ parivattetvā sā pacchā evaṃ vadeyya—‘handāyye, tuyhaṃ cīvaraṃ āhara, metaṃ cīvaraṃ, yaṃ tuyhaṃ tuyhamevetaṃ, yaṃ mayhaṃ mayhamevetaṃ, āhara metaṃ, sakaṃ paccāharā’ti acchindeyya vā acchindāpeyya vā, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np3:9.4: … pe … ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np3:11.2: channaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññataraṃ cīvaraṃ vikappanupagaṃ pacchimaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np3:12.2: parittena vā vipulaṃ, vipulena vā parittaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np3:14.3: Sakiṃ āṇattā bahukampi acchindati, nissaggiyaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np3:14.4: Nissajjitabbaṃ saṃghassa vā gaṇassa vā ekabhikkhuniyā vā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np3:14.7: “idaṃ me, ayye, cīvaraṃ bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ parivattetvā acchinnaṃ nissaggiyaṃ, imāhaṃ saṃghassa nissajjāmī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-np3:15.1: Upasampannāya upasampannasaññā cīvaraṃ parivattetvā acchindati vā acchindāpeti vā, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np3:15.2: Upasampannāya vematikā cīvaraṃ parivattetvā acchindati vā acchindāpeti vā, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np3:15.3: Upasampannāya anupasampannasaññā cīvaraṃ parivattetvā acchindati vā acchindāpeti vā, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np3:16.1: Aññaṃ parikkhāraṃ parivattetvā acchindati vā acchindāpeti vā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np3:16.2: Anupasampannāya saddhiṃ cīvaraṃ vā aññaṃ vā parikkhāraṃ parivattetvā acchindati vā acchindāpeti vā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
